alert.note: Alert for Natchitoches; Sabine (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 16 at 2:28AM CDT until June 16 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN NATCHITOCHES AND NORTHEASTERN SABINE PARISHES... At 228 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles northeast of Many, or 14 miles west of Natchitoches, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Natchitoches, Many, Pleasant Hill, Provencal, Natchez, Robeline, Flora, Belmont, Marthaville and Hagewood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
